basic.description: Introduces students to the profession of nursing. Professional relationships and therapeutic communication are the focus of this course. Critical thinking and problem-solving in nursing practice are introduced. Legal and ethical concepts are explored. The professional expectation of reflective, evidence-based practice is introduced. Students are exposed to a variety of nursing roles through class presentations.  2 hours lecture, 2 hour Clinical Education Centre per week; 9 units (3 credits) course weight.
basic.subject: NURS
basic.title: Intro To The Profession Of Nur
